verbs.description: WASHINGTON ( AP ) — [ARGM-LOC: In a surprising overture to China] , [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: said] [ARGM-TMP: Sunday] [ARG1: he would help a Chinese telecommunications company get “ back into business , ” saying too many jobs in China are at stake after] …
